com.eteks.sweethome3d.model

Class HomeFurnitureGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.eteks.sweethome3d.model.HomePieceOfFurniture
      • com.eteks.sweethome3d.model.HomeFurnitureGroup
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Elevatable, PieceOfFurniture, Selectable, Serializable, Cloneable

    public class HomeFurnitureGroup
extends HomePieceOfFurniture
    A group of furniture of furniture.
    Since:
    2.3
    Author:
    Emmanuel Puybaret

    • Constructor Detail

      • HomeFurnitureGroup

        public HomeFurnitureGroup(List<HomePieceOfFurniture> furniture,
                          String name)
        Creates a group from the given furniture list. The level of each piece of furniture of the group will be reset to null and if they belong to levels with different elevations, their elevation will be updated to be relative to the elevation of the lowest level.

      • HomeFurnitureGroup

        public HomeFurnitureGroup(List<HomePieceOfFurniture> furniture,
                          HomePieceOfFurniture leadingPiece,
                          String name)
        Creates a group from the given furniture list. The level of each piece of furniture of the group will be reset to null and if they belong to levels with different elevations, their elevation will be updated to be relative to the elevation of the lowest level. The angle of the group is the one of the leading piece.
        Since:
        4.5
